SANJAY CHOURE

Contact No:  +91- 8849518387 (mobile)
                       +91- 9770402165
Experienced in Rotating and Static Equipment Maintenance 
Petrochemical Refineries and heavy fabrication
Maintenance Activities for rotating equipments:
1.Installation, major Overhauling, Preventive, predictive, Break down and shutdown 
maintenance and troubleshooting of all types of Rotating Equipments (Pumps, 
compressors, Gear boxes, Blowers, induced draft Fans, forced draft fans, Agitators).
2.Hot & Cold Alignment for all rotating equipment by using Reverse dial and Rim & Face 
Dial Indicator  method. 
3.Reading & Understanding of Technical Drawings.
4.Pump and compressor Maintenance Experience.
Maintenance Activities for static equipments: 
1.Retubing of U-tube and straight tube exchanger bundle.
2.Onsite Maintenance and servicing of Heat exchangers and Fin-Fan Coolers.
General workshop maintenance activities: 
1.Good knowledge in Gas cutting & welding, All Machine shop Machineries like. (Lathe, 
Drilling, Milling, Grinding surface grinding) and all types of Field instruments.
2.Assist with Heavy Equipment and Riggers for carrying the material and equipment.
3.Knowledge and worked about NDT and working of UT, MT, RT, DP tests .
Maintain records related for equipments and safety:
1.Documentation of Equipment Maintenance History records, Spare part consumptions, 
yearly budgeting of maintenance cost, Plant down time calculation and Technicians time 
sheets. 
2.Conducting Toolbox meetings, Critical Task analysis and Job safety analysis, and Hazard 
studies.
3.SMP-Standard Maintenance Procedure taken for Hourly based equipment.
4.Co-ordinating with other departments for scheduling and execution of work .
Additional Qualifications:
1.CNC Machine Operation and program for production lathe & AutoCAD 2007 for 
designing works in Indo German Tool room Indore.
2.Knowledge of windows XP/7 and MS office(MS word, Excel & Power point)
3.Training in hydro power plant Bargi.
4.Training in Tata commercial Jabalpur.
